admin: Added "Ändringar" button in the navbar showing a role-filtered list of recent changes to the site
The dialog opens automatically once per browser session, and can be reopened at any time via the navbar button
Changes are grouped by date with a bullet list per date; only entries that have been published (assigned a display date) are shown
Added /changelog command to assign display dates to unpublished changelog entries
/makepr now drafts role-based changelog entries from the diff as its first step before creating a PR
coach: En ny knapp "Ändringar" har lagts till i navigeringsfältet — öppnar en dialog med senaste ändringar relevanta för coacher, grupperade per datum
student: En ny knapp "Ändringar" har lagts till i navigeringsfältet — öppnar en dialog med senaste ändringar relevanta för elever, grupperade per datum
